definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be sick, si vera l. (= I. [[אגשׁ]] acc. to Thes who comp. Syr. na4);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 S. [[וׇֽאָנוּשָׁה]] Ps 69:21, but rd. perh. [[[מַכַּת נַפְשִׁי]]] [[וַאֲנוּשָׁה]] (‖[[חֶרְפָּה שָָׁבְרָה לִבִּי ]]), Bi Che:crit. n., cf. LXX, v. I. [[אנשׁ]] or (< [[קַוּׁה]]) [[וְאָנוּשׁ הוּא קַוֵּה]] (with different word-division), Weir:Acad. 1870, 257 (who cp. Je 17:9, Je 8:15).
